abstract_summ: All 34 children with laboratory-confirmed 2019-nCoV infection were admitted to the Third People's Hospital of Shenzhen from January 19 to Febuary 7, 2020 . Patients could be categorized into different clinical types, including 22 (65%) common cases, 9 (26%) mild cases and 3 (8.8%) asymptomatic cases . The most common symptoms were fever (17 cases, 50%) and cough .
